forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 45. West southwest wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 54, with temperatures falling to around 51 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, a serene veil of cloud hangs in the air, whispering of the coolness to come. The city, still cloaked in the early shadows of the night, reveals only hints of its stirring life below. The forecast promises a high near a crisp 54, while the day will gradually bring the temperature down to a mild 51 in the afternoon. A gentle breeze from the west-southwest, barely noticeable, embraces those who venture outside, making for a calm start to the day.

Despite the promising sun, the marine layer may linger closer to the coast, obscuring the famed Golden Gate Bridge and adding an ethereal charm to the morning. And while the weather isn’t dreary, the hint of cloudiness keeps the day from feeling too bright or harsh. This milder setting invites a layered approach to attire; a light sweater or jacket will be perfect in case the chill hangs around. The more daring might explore the local cafes or take a thoughtful stroll through Golden Gate Park, perhaps stopping for a moment of quiet reflection by the duck pond, where the play of light and shadow pairs beautifully with the city’s awakening.
